G

Game - Class in ZuulBad
This class is the controller class for the graphical user interface and it connects the other classes of the game.
Game() - Constructor for class ZuulBad.Game
initializes the variables environment, timeProperty, player and visiblePause.

Retrieves an accessory from the item list

Get the accessory which is in the room.
